File Compressor

class file_compressor.FileCompressor(file)[source]

Bases: object

Compresses a file

parameter:

file: str

file location

returns:

final_rANS state

Note: The decode function can be used given the class has been configured with correct prob distn.

create_aux_file()[source]

creates an auxiliary file with symbols and their frequency distribution: for decompressor consists of:

symbols, frequency, file_name

using this becomes counter intuituve as the aux_file will have size > original file.

decode(encoded_value: int)[source]
file_encode(compressor)[source]

Given a compression algorithm compressed a file. Parameters:

compressor: str

compression algorithm either from huffman, airhtmetic, range, rANS, sANS

Returns:
encodec_value: int | str | Tuple

the encoded value can be anything depending on the output of the compression algorithm.

summary()[source]

function that gives summary of the file : file_name file_size file_creation_tiem file_modification_time total_symbols unique_symbols frequeency_dist shannon_entrory compressed_size compression_ratio
